extraction_metadata.notes: CRITICAL: XRP wallet address rLEFT4k54Pd1k73iqAsA24S8rqKYv5wWrG extracted. First XRP wallet in dataset. Unique attack vector: fake airdrop phishing via influencer impersonation. Victim entered wallet keys on fake airdrop claim site. $63,543.92 loss - HIGH VALUE CASE. DFPI included general airdrop warning in report.

chain_of_thought.step_1_initial_contact: Scammer impersonated popular YouTube crypto influencer on Twitter
chain_of_thought.step_2_platform_migration: Convinced victim to move conversation to WhatsApp for 'privacy'
chain_of_thought.step_3_trust_building: Leveraged fake influencer credibility to build immediate trust
chain_of_thought.step_5_attack_execution: Provided phishing link flrmeshworknet.us to 'claim' airdrop tokens
chain_of_thought.step_6_extraction: Victim entered wallet keys, received error message, funds stolen
